text: George Gilbert Ramsay (1839–1921) was the Professor of Humanity at the University of Glasgow and the first president of the Scottish Mountaineering Club. ==References== Category:1839 births Category:1921 deaths Category:Academics of the University of Glasgow Category:Alumni of Girton College, Cambridge Category:Scottish classical scholars Category:British mountain climbers Category:19th-century Scottish people Category:20th-century Scottish people
title: George Gilbert Ramsay
